title: Great Barrier Reef Private Island Luxury with All-Inclusive Drinks & Dining
description:
A jewel in the ocean, Orpheus Island Lodge is an exclusive private island paradise amid the breathtaking beauty of the world’s largest coral reef, the World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Succumb to laidback luxury and indulge in all-inclusive dining with daily à la carte breakfast, tapas-style lunch inspired by cuisines from around the world, nightly four-course degustation dinner and a selection of quality Australian wines, beers and soft drinks. 

Enjoy every moment with a fully stocked minibar, an A$100 resort credit per room, a bottle of French Champagne with chocolate-dipped strawberries on arrival, a daily Orpheus experience such as snorkelling, fishing or an island cruise, plus unlimited use of the motorised dinghies, paddleboards, kayaks and catamaran.

**TripAdvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top Small Hotels - Australia

title: All-Inclusive Indulgence at the Reef’s Most Exclusive Private Island Resort
description: A jewel in the ocean, the beautiful Orpheus Island Lodge offers exclusive private island luxury in the midst of one of the world’s most spectacular natural phenomenons: the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Submit to barefoot luxury and indulge in all-inclusive cuisine crafted with fresh local produce and seafood - including nightly four-course degustation dinners overlooking the ocean - select Australian wines and beers and a fully-stocked mini-bar, an AU$100 resort credit, a bottle of French Champagne with chocolate-dipped strawberries on arrival, unlimited use of motorised and non-motorised watersports and a daily experience such as a sunset cruise or hiking.

title: All-Inclusive Great Barrier Reef Boutique Private Island Luxury with Onsite Spa
description: A jewel in the ocean, Orpheus Island Lodge is an exclusive private island paradise amid the breathtaking beauty of the world’s largest coral reef, the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Succumb to laidback luxury at this peaceful hideaway set on more than 1000 hectares of national park and boasting 11 kilometres of immaculate turquoise coastline. With a maximum of 28 guests permitted on the island at any time, be spoiled by boutique service and make the most of the alfresco Pavillion Bar, quaint reading room, restorative Gwandalan Spa and twinkling infinity pool. When you’re not lounging by the gleaming water, explore the island's walking tracks, make use of the complimentary catamaran, paddleboards, and kayaks or join a thrilling day trip to the reef.
